sections.text: Transferee in revocatory action; right to plead discussionWhen a revocatory action is brought by a creditor to set aside a transfer of property made by his debtor, the transferee may plead discussion to compel the creditor to obtain and execute a judgment against the debtor before setting the transfer aside.
